database.defaultdb module

class database.defaultdb.DefaultDatabase(db_name='default.db')

Bases: object

Provides basic operations for working with a database.

Variables:

  • db_name (str) – name of database.

  • db_exists (bool) –

    .

__init__(self, db_name='default.db')

Establishes a connection to the database.

create_tables(self, table_name, *args)

Creates a table in the database.

insert_data(self, table_name, data)

Inserts a record into the table.

insert_or_replace_data(self, table_name, data)

Inserts or replaces a record in the table.

get_all_data(self, table_name)

Retrieves all records from the table.

delete_row(self, table_name, condition)

Deletes a record from the table based on the specified condition.

clear_table(self, table_name)

Clears all records from the table.

drop_table(self, table_name)

Drops the specified table from the database.

drop_database(self)

Drops the entire database.

clear_table(table_name)

Clears all records from the table.

Parameters:

table_name (str) – The name of the table.

create_tables(table_name, *args)

Creates a table in the database.

Parameters:

  • table_name (str) – The name of the table.

  • *args – Column names and their data types.

delete_row(table_name, condition)

Deletes a record from the table based on the specified condition.

Parameters:

  • table_name (str) – The name of the table.

  • condition (str) – The condition for deleting records.

drop_database()

Drops the entire database.

drop_table(table_name)

Drops the specified table from the database.

Parameters:

table_name (str) – The name of the table.

get_all_data(table_name)

Retrieves all records from the table.

Parameters:

table_name (str) – The name of the table.

Returns:

List of tuples representing the records.

insert_data(table_name, data)

Inserts a record into the table.

Parameters:

  • table_name (str) – The name of the table.

  • data (dict) – Dictionary representing the record to be inserted.

insert_or_replace_data(table_name, data)

Inserts or replaces a record in the table.

Parameters:

  • table_name (str) – The name of the table.

  • data (dict) – Dictionary representing the record to be inserted or replaced.

Get the hero’s name for a user from the table.

Returns:

Return type:

str or None

insert_field(telegram_id, hero_name)

Insert or update a hero’s name in the table.

Parameters:

  • telegram_id (int) – Telegram ID of the user.

  • hero_name (str) – Name of the hero.

Insert a user record into the table.

Parameters:

  • username (str) – Username of the user.

  • first_name (str) – First name of the user.

  • is_bot (int) – Indicator of whether the user is a bot.
